data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zargar, Mohammad, Gupta, Ankita, Talebi, Asghar, Farahani, Samira (2019): A review of the Iranian species of genus Iconella Mason (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Microgastrinae) with description of two new species. Zootaxa 4586 (3): 491-504, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4586.3.6|8 occurrences
